mdRecord.dcterms:title: E-Summit
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Sublette, Bill [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Edward L. Ayers, from the University History department, moderates the panel The Academical Village in the Internet Age. Panelists in Old Cabell Hall included Peter E. Brownfeld, University student; U. Bertram Ellis, Jr., from iXL Holdings, Inc.; Brandi S. Hughes, University student; Halsey M. Minor, from CNET, Inc.; Jeffrey D. Nuechterlein, National Gypsum Company; Jahan Ramazani, from the University English department; John M. Unsworth, University Institute for Advanced Technology in the Humanities; and William A. Wulf, University Engineering School [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office--Press coverage
